Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all activity executions in the event log
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' occurrences across all cases
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of process variants that include 'Accepted + Wait - Customer'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' being directly followed by 'Completed + Resolved'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + Resolved' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' that occur after 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Queued + Awaiting Assignment'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' appearing in variants that eventually lead to 'Completed + Closed'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities for cases where activity 'Completed + Closed' occurs

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' compared to the frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - User'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Accepted + Wait - User'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' relative to 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities for cases where activity 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor' occurs

Name: Percentage of cases containing 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' that also contain 'Completed + In Call'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in variants with total performance duration above the median
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' occurrences that are not immediately followed by another wait-type activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases where 'Accepted + Wait' does not happen

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' that appear before any occurrence of 'Completed + In Call' in the same case
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in comparison to the most frequent activity 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities for cases where activity 'Accepted + In Progress' occurs

Name: Percentage of variants where 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' is the only customer-related wait state
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all cases where 'Accepted + Wait - User' does not happen

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' grouped by country of the resource
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities grouped by the last value of resource country

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' events that occur in cases also containing at least one 'Completed + In Call' activity
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Completed + In Call'

Name: Ratio of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' to total wait-type activities (including 'Accepted + Wait', 'Accepted + Wait - User', 'Accepted + Wait - Vendor', 'Accepted + Wait - Implementation')
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Accepted + Wait'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' in high-duration variants (performance > 1,000,000)
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities

Name: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' that directly precede 'Accepted + In Progress'
Metric: Percentage of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' out of all 'Accepted + In Progress'

Name: Frequency of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' per year based on timestamp
Metric: Number of 'Accepted + Wait - Customer' activities
